TH:BikiniMail.NAME: Bikini Mail
TH:BikiniMail.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! block. NL Exhaust.

TH:CursedSword.NAME: Cursed Sword
TH:CursedSword.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust. NL NL That's all, honestly!

TH:DeckOfManyThings.NAME: Deck of Many Things
TH:DeckOfManyThings.DESCRIPTION: Add a random rare or treasure card to your hand. NL Exhaust.
TH:DeckOfManyThings.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random upgraded rare or treasure card to your hand. NL Exhaust.

TH:Mimic.NAME: Treasure Chest
TH:Mimic.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 HP. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

TH:PixieDust.NAME: Pixie Dust
TH:PixieDust.DESCRIPTION: Transform and upgrade a random card. NL Exhaust.
TH:PixieDust.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Transform and upgrade a chosen card. NL Exhaust.

TH:ElvenBoots.NAME: Elven Boots
TH:ElvenBoots.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Exhaust. NL NL One size too small.
